uploads.description: Enable Web Streams for large file uploads (experimental)
uploads.timeoutDescription: Total upload timeout in milliseconds (5 minutes)
uploads.chunkTimeoutDescription: Maximum time between chunks in milliseconds (10 seconds)
uploads.maxCompressionRatioDescription: Maximum allowed compression ratio for bomb detection

security.preventPathTraversalDescription: Sanitize file paths to prevent directory traversal
security.enableLeasingDescription: Prevent concurrent writes to same destination
security.leaseTimeoutDescription: Lease auto-release timeout in milliseconds (5 minutes)

performance.highWaterMarkDescription: Stream buffer high water mark in bytes (64KB)

telemetry.exportIntervalDescription: Metrics export interval in milliseconds (1 minute)

cleanup.enabledDescription: Enable automatic cleanup of orphaned uploads
cleanup.cronScheduleDescription: Cron schedule for cleanup job (2 AM daily)
cleanup.orphanedTimeoutDescription: Time before upload is considered orphaned in milliseconds (24 hours)
cleanup.batchSizeDescription: Number of orphaned uploads to process per batch
